(<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>) {\n        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> !filter || <span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>\n      }\n    }\n  }\n})\n<span     </span>\n                </div>\n               </td>\n               <!-- todo: when upgrading to vue 2.x.x put a th here for the mainCol -->\n              </tr>\n              <tr <pre>  <code class="hljs xml">\n<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span>\n<span class="hljs-attr">table-classes</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"ui celled table unstackable orange"</span>\n<span class="hljs-attr">:body</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"[\n    {\'Yo Dawg! I heard you like Vue Smart Table, so\': [\n      {\'what I have put\':\'a Vue Smart Table\',\n        where:\'inside your Vue Smart Table\',\n        \'so you can\':\'Smart Table\', \'while you\':\'Smart Table\'},\n      {\'what I have put\':\'a Smart Component\',\n        where:\'inside your Smart Component\',\n        \'so you can\':\'compose\', \'while you\':\'compose\'},  \n    ], \'Lonely Column\': \'Forever a col\'}\n]"</span>\n&gt;</span>\n    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">wrapper</span> <span class="hljs-attr">col</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"Yo Dawg! I heard you like Vue Smart Table, so"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">wrapper</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span>&gt;</span>\n  </code>\n  <code class="hljs coffeescript">\nVue.component(<span class="hljs-string">\'wrapper\'</span>, {\n  template: `<span class="javascript">&lt;div&gt;\n      <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span> \n        <span class="hljs-attr">:body</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"value"</span>\n        <span class="hljs-attr">table-classes</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"ui celled table unstackable brown"</span>&gt;</span>\n      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span>&gt;</span>\n    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span></span>`\n})\n<span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Vue({el: <span class="hljs-string">\'#yoDawg\'</span>})\n  </code>\n</pre>\n   </div>\n  </div>\n  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/vue/1.0.26/vue.js">\n  </script>\n  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/vue-resource/0.8.0/vue-resource.js">\n  </script>\n  <script src="https://npmcdn.com/vue-smart-table@2.5.0-beta1/dist/static/vue-smart-table.js">\n  </script>\n  <script>\n   /* global Vue */\n    Vue.component(\'wrapper\', {\n        template: `&lt;div&gt;&lt;smart-table :body="value" table-classes="ui celled table unstackable brown"&gt;&lt;/smart-table&gt;&lt;/div&gt;`\n    })\n    \n    Vue.component(\'truefalse\', {\n        template: `&lt;p&gt;{{value || \'false\'}}&lt;/p&gt;`,\n        methods: {\n            filterFunction (filter) {\n                return function (value) {\n                    return !filter || value\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    })\n    \n    Vue.component(\'badges\', {\n        template: `&lt;div class="ui list"&gt;\n                     &lt;div class="item" v-for="badge in value"&gt;\n                       &lt;img :src="\'/vue-smart-table/badges/\'+badge+\'.png\'" class="ui avatar image"/&gt;\n                       &lt;div class="content"&gt;\n                         &lt;div class="description"&gt;{{badge}}&lt;/div&gt;\n                       &lt;/div&gt;\n                     &lt;/div&gt;\n                   &lt;/div&gt;`\n    })\n    \n    Vue.component(\'dashboard\', {\n        template: `&lt;div&gt;\n                     &lt;button v-for="(action, link) in value" class="ui button"&gt;{{action}}&lt;/button&gt;\n                   &lt;/div&gt;`\n    })\n    \n    Vue.component(\'fontawesome\', {\n        template: \' &lt;i class="fa fa-{{value}}" aria-hidden="true"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;\',\n        created: function () {injectFontAwesome()}\n    })\n\n    Vue.component(\'contacts\', {\n        template: "&lt;div&gt;tel. {{value ? value.phone : \'\'}}&lt;br/&gt;cell. {{value ? value.cell : \'\'}}&lt;/div&gt;"\n    })\n\n    Vue.component(\'src2img\', {\n        template: \'&lt;img :src="value"&gt;&lt;/img&gt;\'\n    })\n\n    Vue.component(\'nationality\', {\n        template: "&lt;p&gt;{{$parent.nationalityCache &amp;&amp; $parent.nationalityCache[value]}}&lt;/p&gt;",\n        init () {\n            if (this.$parent.nationalityCache === undefined) {\n                Vue.set(this.$parent, \'nationalityCache\', {})\n            }\n        },\n        ready () {\n            if (this.$parent.nationalityCache[this.value] === undefined) {\n                Vue.set(this.$parent.nationalityCache, this.value, \'loading...\')\n                this.$http.get(\'http://restcountries.eu/rest/v1/alpha/\' + this.value)\n                    .then(function(res){Vue.set(this.$parent.nationalityCache, this.value, res.data.name)})\n            }\n        }\n    })\n    \n    new Vue({el: \'#app1\'})\n    new Vue({el: \'#filterAll\', methods: {searchAll (e) {this.$broadcast(\'filter\', {filter: e.target.value, col: [\'desc\']})}}})\n    new Vue({el: \'#filterScoped\', methods: {search (col, filter) {this.$broadcast(\'filter\', {col, filter})}}})\n    new Vue({el: \'#yoDawg\'})\n\n    function injectFontAwesome() {\n        // avoid duplicates\n        for (var i = 0; i &lt; document.styleSheets.length; i++) {\n            if (document.styleSheets[i].href === href) {\n                return\n            }\n        }\n        var head = document.getElementsByTagName(\'head\')[0]\n        var link = document.createElement(\'link\')\n        link.rel = \'stylesheet\'\n        link.type = \'text/css\'\n        var href = \'https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.6.3/css/font-awesome.min.css\'\n        link.href = href\n        head.appendChild(link)\n    }\n  </script>\n </body>\n</html>'b'<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang="en-us" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">\n <head>\n  <meta charset="utf-8"/>\n  <title>\n   Vue-smart-table by gurghet\n  </title>\n  <meta content="width=device-width, </div>\n   </div>\n   <div class="code">\n    <pre><code class="html hljs xml">\n<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span>\n  <span {injectFontAwesome()}\n})\n\nVue.component(<span class="hljs-string">\'contacts\'</span>, {\n  template: `&lt;div&gt;tel. {{<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span> ? <span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>.phone : <span class="hljs-string">\'\'</span>}}&lt;br/&gt;\n    cell. {{<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span> ? <span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>.cell : <span class="hljs-string">\'\'</span>}}&lt;/div&gt;`\n})\n\nVue.component(<span class="hljs-string">\'src2img\'</span>, {\n  template: <span class="hljs-string">\'&lt;img :src="value"&gt;&lt;/img&gt;\'</span>\n})\n\nVue.component(<span class="hljs-string">\'nationality\'</span>, {\n  template: `&lt;p&gt;\n    {{$parent.nationalityCache &amp;&amp; $parent.nationalityCache[<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>]}}\n    &lt;/p&gt;`,\n  init () {\n    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.$parent.nationalityCache === undefined) {\n      Vue.<span class="hljs-keyword">set</span>(<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.$parent, <span class="hljs-string">\'nationalityCache\'</span>, {})\n    }\n  },\n  ready () {\n    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.$parent.nationalityCache[<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>] === undefined) {\n      Vue.<span class="hljs-keyword">set</span>(\n        <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.$parent.nationalityCache,\n        <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>,\n        <span class="hljs-string">\'loading...\'</span>\n      )\n          \n      <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.$http.<span class="hljs-keyword">get</span>(<span class="hljs-string">\'//restcountries.eu/rest/v1/alpha/\'</span> + <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>)\n        .then(function(res){\n          Vue.<span class="hljs-keyword">set</span>(\n            <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.$parent.nationalityCache,\n            <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>,\n            res.data.name\n          )\n        })\n    }\n  }\n})\n\n<span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Vue({el: <span class="hljs-string">\'#app1\'</span>})\n    </code>\n    </pre>\n   </div>\n  </div>\n  <div class="wrapper">\n   <div class="tables">\n    <div id="filterAll">\n     <div class="ui input">\n      <input placeholder="Search" title="search"     false\n      </div>\n     </div>\n    </div>\n   </div>\n   <div class="code">\n    <pre>    <code class="hljs xml">\n<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"filters"</span>&gt;</span>\n  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"checkbox"</span>\n        @<span class="hljs-attr">change</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"search(\'openSource\', $event.target.checked)"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">input</span>&gt;</span>\n      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">label</span> <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span>&gt;</span>\n    </code>\n    <code class="hljs cs">\nVue.component(<span class="hljs-string">\'truefalse\'</span>, {\n  template: `&lt;p&gt;{{<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span> || <span class="hljs-string">\'false\'</span>}}&lt;/p&gt;`,\n  methods: {\n    filterFunction (filter) {\n      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> function (<span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>) {\n        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> !filter || <span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>\n      }\n    }\n  }\n})\n<span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Vue({\n  el: <span class="hljs-string">\'#filterScoped\'</span>,\n  methods: {\n    search (col, filter) {\n      <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.$broadcast(<span class="hljs-string">\'filter\'</span>, {col, filter})\n    }\n  }\n})\n    </code>\n  </pre>\n   </div>\n  </div>\n  <div class="wrapper">\n   <div <pre>  <code class="hljs xml">\n<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span>\n<span class="hljs-attr">table-classes</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"ui celled table unstackable orange"</span>\n<span class="hljs-attr">:body</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"[\n    {\'Yo Dawg! I heard you like Vue Smart Table, so\': [\n      {\'what I have put\':\'a Vue Smart Table\',\n        where:\'inside your Vue Smart Table\',\n        \'so you can\':\'Smart Table\', \'while you\':\'Smart Table\'},\n      {\'what I have put\':\'a Smart Component\',\n        where:\'inside your Smart Component\',\n        \'so you can\':\'compose\', \'while you\':\'compose\'},  \n    ], \'Lonely Column\': \'Forever a col\'}\n]"</span>\n&gt;</span>\n    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">wrapper</span> <span class="hljs-attr">col</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"Yo Dawg! I heard you like Vue Smart Table, so"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">wrapper</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span>&gt;</span>\n  </code>\n  <code class="hljs coffeescript">\nVue.component(<span class="hljs-string">\'wrapper\'</span>, {\n  template: `<span class="javascript">&lt;div&gt;\n      <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span> \n        <span class="hljs-attr">:body</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"value"</span>\n        <span class="hljs-attr">table-classes</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"ui celled table unstackable brown"</span>&gt;</span>\n      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">smart-table</span>&gt;</span>\n    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span></span>`\n})\n<span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Vue({el: <span class="hljs-string">\'#yoDawg\'</span>})\n  </code>\n</pre>\n   </div>\n  </div>\n  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/vue/1.0.26/vue.js">\n  </script>\n  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/vue-resource/0.8.0/vue-resource.js">\n  </script>\n  <script src="https://npmcdn.com/vue-smart-table@2.5.0-beta1/dist/static/vue-smart-table.js">\n  </script>\n  <script>\n   /* global Vue */\n    Vue.component(\'wrapper\', {\n        template: `&lt;div&gt;&lt;smart-table :body="value" table-classes="ui celled table unstackable brown"&gt;&lt;/smart-table&gt;&lt;/div&gt;`\n    })\n    \n    Vue.component(\'truefalse\', {\n        template: `&lt;p&gt;{{value || \'false\'}}&lt;/p&gt;`,\n        methods: {\n            filterFunction (filter) {\n                return function (value) {\n                    return !filter || value\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    })\n    \n    Vue.component(\'badges\', {\n        template: `&lt;div class="ui list"&gt;\n                     &lt;div class="item" v-for="badge in value"&gt;\n                       &lt;img :src="\'/vue-smart-table/badges/\'+badge+\'.png\'" class="ui avatar image"/&gt;\n                       &lt;div class="content"&gt;\n                         &lt;div class="description"&gt;{{badge}}&lt;/div&gt;\n                       &lt;/div&gt;\n                     &lt;/div&gt;\n                   &lt;/div&gt;`\n    })\n    \n    Vue.component(\'dashboard\', {\n        template: `&lt;div&gt;\n                     &lt;button v-for="(action, link) in value" class="ui button"&gt;{{action}}&lt;/button&gt;\n                   &lt;/div&gt;`\n    })\n    \n    Vue.component(\'fontawesome\', {\n        template: \' &lt;i class="fa fa-{{value}}" aria-hidden="true"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;\',\n        created: function () {injectFontAwesome()}\n    })\n\n    Vue.component(\'contacts\', {\n        template: "&lt;div&gt;tel. {{value ? value.phone : \'\'}}&lt;br/&gt;cell. {{value ? value.cell : \'\'}}&lt;/div&gt;"\n    })\n\n    Vue.component(\'src2img\', {\n        template: \'&lt;img :src="value"&gt;&lt;/img&gt;\'\n    })\n\n    Vue.component(\'nationality\', {\n        template: "&lt;p&gt;{{$parent.nationalityCache &amp;&amp; $parent.nationalityCache[value]}}&lt;/p&gt;",\n        init () {\n            if (this.$parent.nationalityCache === undefined) {\n                Vue.set(this.$parent, \'nationalityCache\', {})\n            }\n        },\n        ready () {\n            if (this.$parent.nationalityCache[this.value] === undefined) {\n                Vue.set(this.$parent.nationalityCache, this.value, \'loading...\')\n                this.$http.get(\'http://restcountries.eu/rest/v1/alpha/\' + this.value)\n                    .then(function(res){Vue.set(this.$parent.nationalityCache, this.value, res.data.name)})\n            }\n        }\n    })\n    \n    new Vue({el: \'#app1\'})\n    new Vue({el: \'#filterAll\', methods: {searchAll (e) {this.$broadcast(\'filter\', {filter: e.target.value, col: [\'desc\']})}}})\n    new Vue({el: \'#filterScoped\', methods: {search (col, filter) {this.$broadcast(\'filter\', {col, filter})}}})\n    new Vue({el: \'#yoDawg\'})\n\n    function injectFontAwesome() {\n        // avoid duplicates\n        for (var i = 0; i &lt; document.styleSheets.length; i++) {\n            if (document.styleSheets[i].href === href) {\n                return\n            }\n        }\n        var head = document.getElementsByTagName(\'head\')[0]\n        var link = document.createElement(\'link\')\n        link.rel = \'stylesheet\'\n        link.type = \'text/css\'\n        var href = \'https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.6.3/css/font-awesome.min.css\'\n        link.href = href\n        head.appendChild(link)\n    }\n  </script>\n </body>\n</html>'
